00023 ConfigFilter::ConfigFilter( QWidget * parent, const QVariantList & args )
00024   : KCModule( ConfigFilterFactory::componentData(), parent, args )

00036   connect( chkActivateFilter, SIGNAL( toggled( bool ) ), this, SLOT( slotFilterActiveToggled( bool ) ) );

00135   cmbActionOthers->insertItem( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK, i18nc( "@item:inlistbox check the filtered mail for spam", "Spamcheck" ) );
00136   cmbActionOthers->insertItem( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE, i18nc( "@item:inlistbox ignore the filtered mail", "Ignore" ) );
00137 
00138   //create edit line to defined the mailbox for move
00139   txtMailbox = new KLineEdit( gboxOthers );
00140   layOthers->addWidget( txtMailbox );
00141   connect( txtMailbox, SIGNAL( textChanged( const QString & ) ), this, SLOT( slotChanged() ) );
00142

00146   layOthers->addWidget( btnMailboxWizard );
00147   connect( btnMailboxWizard, SIGNAL( clicked() ), this, SLOT( slotOpenMailBoxWizard() ) );
00148 
00149   //set defaults
00150   switch( DEFAULT_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION )
00151   {
00152     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS ); break;
00153     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE     : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE ); break;
00154     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK ); break;
00155     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE ); break;
00156     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE     : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE ); break;
00157     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK  : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK ); break;
00158   }
00159   chkActivateFilter->setChecked( DEFAULT_FILTER_ACTIVE );
00160 
00161   //enable or disable widgets
00162   slotOtherActionChanged( cmbActionOthers->currentIndex() );
00163   slotFilterActiveToggled( DEFAULT_FILTER_ACTIVE );
00164 
00165   //get application config object (kshowmailrc)
00166   config = KGlobal::config();
00167 
00168   //init counter for filter item numbering. This variable contains the last assigned number of a filter setup item.
00169   //Because it is initialized with zero, the first filter number is 1.
00170   lastFilterNumber = 0;
00171 
00172   setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Preferred );
00173 
00174 }

00177 ConfigFilter::~ConfigFilter()
00178 {
00179 }
00180 
00181 void ConfigFilter::load( )
00182 {
00183   KConfigGroup* configFilter = new KConfigGroup( config, CONFIG_GROUP_FILTER );
00184 
00185   //load filter active state
00186   chkActivateFilter->setChecked( configFilter->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_ACTIVE, DEFAULT_FILTER_ACTIVE ) );
00187   slotFilterActiveToggled( chkActivateFilter->isChecked() );
00188 
00189   //load other action
00190   switch( configFilter->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, DEFAULT_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION ) )
00191   {
00192     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS ); break;
00193     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE     : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE ); break;
00194     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK ); break;
00195     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE ); break;
00196     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE     : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE ); break;
00197     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK  : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK ); break;
00198   }
00199 
00200   //get mailbox name
00201   if( configFilter->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, DEFAULT_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION ) == CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE )
00202     txtMailbox->setText( configFilter->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_MAILBOX, DEFAULT_FILTER_ACTION_MOVE_MAILBOX ) );
00203   else
00204     txtMailbox->clear();
00205 
00206   //enable or disable widgets for other action
00207   slotOtherActionChanged( cmbActionOthers->currentIndex() );
00208 
00209   //clear filter list
00210   listFilters->clear();
00211 
00212   //get number of filters
00213   uint numFilters = configFilter->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_NUMBER_OF_FILTERS, 0 );
00214 
00215   //create filter setup items and load theirs settings
00216   for( uint ctr = 1; ctr <= numFilters; ctr++ )
00217   {
00218     //create filter item
00219     FilterSetupItem* item = new FilterSetupItem( listFilters, ctr );
00220 
00221     //load settings
00222     item->load();
00223   }
00224 
00225   //set filter index counter
00226   lastFilterNumber = numFilters;
00227 
00228   delete configFilter;
00229 }
00230 
00231 void ConfigFilter::defaults( )
00232 {
00233   chkActivateFilter->setChecked( DEFAULT_FILTER_ACTIVE );
00234   slotFilterActiveToggled( chkActivateFilter->isChecked() );
00235 
00236   switch( DEFAULT_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION )
00237   {
00238     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS ); break;
00239     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE     : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE ); break;
00240     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK ); break;
00241     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE       : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE ); break;
00242     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE     : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE ); break;
00243     case CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK  : cmbActionOthers->setCurrentIndex( ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK ); break;
00244   }
00245 
00246   if( DEFAULT_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION == CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE )
00247     txtMailbox->setText( QString( DEFAULT_FILTER_ACTION_MOVE_MAILBOX ) );
00248   else
00249     txtMailbox->clear();
00250 
00251   //enable or disable widgets for other action
00252   slotOtherActionChanged( cmbActionOthers->currentIndex() );
00253 
00254   slotChanged();
00255 }
00256 
00257 void ConfigFilter::save( )
00258 {
00259   KConfigGroup* configFilter = new KConfigGroup( config, CONFIG_GROUP_FILTER );
00260 
00261   //save filter active state
00262   configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_ACTIVE, chkActivateFilter->isChecked() );
00263 
00264   //save other action
00265   switch( cmbActionOthers->currentIndex() )
00266   {
00267     case ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS      : configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_PASS ); break;
00268     case ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE    : configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_DELETE ); break;
00269     case ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK      : configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MARK ); break;
00270     case ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE      : configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE ); break;
00271     case ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE    : configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_IGNORE ); break;
00272     case ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK : configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, CONFIG_VALUE_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_SPAMCHECK ); break;
00273     default                                      : configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION, DEFAULT_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION ); break;
00274   }
00275 
00276   //save mailbox name
00277   if( cmbActionOthers->currentIndex() == ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE )
00278   {
00279     configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_MAILBOX, txtMailbox->text() );
00280   }
00281   else
00282   {
00283     configFilter->deleteEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_OTHERS_MAILBOX );
00284   }
00285 
00286   //get old number of filters
00287   uint oldNumFilter = configFilter->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_NUMBER_OF_FILTERS, 0 );
00288 
00289   //save current number of filters
00290   configFilter->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_FILTER_NUMBER_OF_FILTERS, lastFilterNumber );
00291 
00292   //delete surplus filter configurations
00293   if( oldNumFilter > lastFilterNumber )
00294   {
00295     for( uint ctr = lastFilterNumber + 1; ctr <= oldNumFilter; ctr++ )
00296     {
00297       config->deleteGroup( QString( "%1%2" ).arg( CONFIG_GROUP_FILTER ).arg( ctr ) );
00298     }
00299   }
00300 
00301   //save the filters
00302   QTreeWidgetItemIterator it( listFilters );
00303 
00304   //iterate over the filter list
00305   while( *it )
00306   {
00307     ( (FilterSetupItem*)*it)->save();
00308 
00309     //get next item
00310     ++it;
00311   }
00312 
00313   config->sync();
00314 }
00315 
00316 void ConfigFilter::slotChanged( )
00317 {
00318   KCModule::changed();
00319 }

00321 void ConfigFilter::slotOpenWhitelist( )
00322 {

00324   QPointer<SenderListDialog> dlg = new SenderListDialog( this, SenderListDialog::White );
00325   dlg->exec();
00326 
00327   //delete dialog
00328   delete dlg;
00329 }

00333   //open list dialog
00334   QPointer<SenderListDialog> dlg = new SenderListDialog( this, SenderListDialog::Black );
00335   dlg->exec();
00336 
00337   //delete dialog
00338   delete dlg;

00340 
00341 void ConfigFilter::slotAdd( )
00342 {
00343   //create a new filter setup item
00344   FilterSetupItem* item = new FilterSetupItem( listFilters , lastFilterNumber + 1 );
00345 
00346   //open setup dialog
00347   FilterSetupDialog* dlg = new FilterSetupDialog( this, item );
00348   int res = dlg->exec();
00349 
00350   if( res == KDialog::Accepted )
00351   {
00352     //inform application setup dialog about changes
00353     slotChanged();
00354 
00355     //increase variable for the last assigned filter number
00356     lastFilterNumber++;
00357   }
00358   else
00359     //delete new item because the user don't want it
00360     delete item;
00361 
00362   //delete dialog
00363   delete dlg;
00364 
00365   //do sorting
00366   listFilters->sortItems( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00367 
00368 }
00369 
00370 void ConfigFilter::slotEdit( )
00371 {
00372   //get selected item
00373   QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> items = listFilters->selectedItems();
00374   if( items.isEmpty() ) return;
00375 
00376   FilterSetupItem* item = (FilterSetupItem*)items.first();
00377 
00378   //return if no item selected
00379   if( item == NULL ) return;
00380 
00381   //open setup dialog
00382   QPointer<FilterSetupDialog> dlg = new FilterSetupDialog( this, item );
00383   int res = dlg->exec();
00384 
00385   //inform application setup dialog about changes
00386   if( res == KDialog::Accepted )
00387     slotChanged();
00388 
00389   //delete dialog
00390   delete dlg;
00391 
00392 }
00393 
00394 void ConfigFilter::slotRemove( )
00395 {
00396   //get selected item
00397   QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> items = listFilters->selectedItems();
00398   if( items.isEmpty() ) return;
00399 
00400   FilterSetupItem* item = (FilterSetupItem*)items.first();
00401 
00402   if( item != NULL )
00403   {
00404     //get number of the item
00405     uint num = item->getNumber();
00406 
00407     //delete item
00408     delete item;
00409 
00410     //decrease the number of all filter items after the removed one
00411     decreaseNumbers( num + 1 );
00412 
00413     //decrease last assigned number
00414     lastFilterNumber--;
00415 
00416     //inform application setup dialog about changes
00417     slotChanged();
00418 
00419     //do sorting
00420     listFilters->sortItems( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00421 
00422   }
00423 }
00424 
00425 void ConfigFilter::slotOtherActionChanged( int index )
00426 {
00427   switch( index )
00428   {
00429     case ID_COMBO_FILTER_OTHERS_ACTION_MOVE : txtMailbox->setEnabled( true );
00430                                               if( txtMailbox->text() == "" ) txtMailbox->setText( DEFAULT_FILTER_ACTION_MOVE_MAILBOX );
00431                                               btnMailboxWizard->setHidden( false );
00432                                               break;
00433     default                                 : txtMailbox->setEnabled( false );
00434                                               btnMailboxWizard->setHidden( true );
00435                                               break;
00436   }
00437 }
00438 
00439 void ConfigFilter::decreaseNumbers( uint number )
00440 {
00441   //get an iterator of the list view
00442   QTreeWidgetItemIterator it( listFilters );
00443 
00444   //iterate over the filter list
00445   while( *it )
00446   {
00447     //get number of current filter item
00448     uint curNumber = ( (FilterSetupItem*)*it)->getNumber();
00449 
00450     //decrease current number, if the given number is lesser or equals
00451     if( curNumber >= number && curNumber > 0 )
00452       ( (FilterSetupItem*)*it)->setNumber( curNumber - 1 );
00453 
00454     //get next item
00455     ++it;
00456   }
00457 }
00458 
00459 void ConfigFilter::slotMoveTop( )
00460 {
00461   //get selected item
00462   QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> items = listFilters->selectedItems();
00463   if( items.isEmpty() ) return;
00464 
00465   FilterSetupItem* item = (FilterSetupItem*)items.first();
00466 
00467   if( item != NULL )
00468   {
00469     //get number of the item
00470     uint num = item->getNumber();
00471 
00472     if( num > 1 )
00473     {
00474       //set number of the selected to zero, this will move it at the top
00475       item->setNumber( 0 );
00476 
00477       //now we move all items after the old position one step up
00478       decreaseNumbers( num + 1 );
00479 
00480       //at last we add one to all numbers
00481       QTreeWidgetItemIterator it( listFilters );
00482 
00483       while( *it )
00484       {
00485         uint curNumber = ( (FilterSetupItem*)*it )->getNumber();
00486         ( (FilterSetupItem*)*it )->setNumber( curNumber + 1 );
00487 
00488         ++it;
00489       }
00490 
00491 
00492       //inform application setup dialog about changes
00493       slotChanged();
00494 
00495       //do sorting
00496       listFilters->sortItems( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00497 
00498 
00499     }
00500   }
00501 
00502 
00503 }
00504 
00505 void ConfigFilter::slotMoveBottom( )
00506 {
00507   //get selected item
00508   QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> items = listFilters->selectedItems();
00509   if( items.isEmpty() ) return;
00510 
00511   FilterSetupItem* item = (FilterSetupItem*)items.first();
00512 
00513   if( item != NULL )
00514   {
00515     //get number of the item
00516     uint num = item->getNumber();
00517 
00518     if( num < lastFilterNumber )
00519     {
00520       //move the selected item at the bottom
00521       item->setNumber( lastFilterNumber + 1 );
00522 
00523       //move all items after the old position one step up (decrease number)
00524       decreaseNumbers( num + 1 );
00525 
00526       //refresh list view
00527 
00528       //inform application setup dialog about changes
00529       slotChanged();
00530 
00531       //do sorting
00532       listFilters->sortItems( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00533   }
00534 
00535   }
00536 }
00537 
00538 void ConfigFilter::slotMoveUp( )
00539 {
00540   //get selected item
00541   QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> items = listFilters->selectedItems();
00542   if( items.isEmpty() ) return;
00543 
00544   FilterSetupItem* item = (FilterSetupItem*)items.first();
00545 
00546   if( item != NULL )
00547   {
00548     //get number of the item
00549     uint num = item->getNumber();
00550 
00551     if( num > 1 )
00552     {
00553       //get item before the selected one
00554       FilterSetupItem* itemBefore = getFilterItem( num - 1 );
00555 
00556       if( itemBefore != NULL )
00557       {
00558         //swap numbers
00559         item->setNumber( num - 1 );
00560         itemBefore->setNumber( num );
00561 
00562         //inform application setup dialog about changes
00563         slotChanged();
00564 
00565       //do sorting
00566       listFilters->sortItems( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00567 
00568       }
00569     }
00570 
00571   }
00572 }
00573 
00574 void ConfigFilter::slotMoveDown( )
00575 {
00576   //get selected item
00577   QList<QTreeWidgetItem*> items = listFilters->selectedItems();
00578   if( items.isEmpty() ) return;
00579 
00580   FilterSetupItem* item = (FilterSetupItem*)items.first();
00581 
00582   if( item != NULL )
00583   {
00584     //get number of the item
00585     uint num = item->getNumber();
00586 
00587     if( num < lastFilterNumber )
00588     {
00589       //get item behind the selected one
00590       FilterSetupItem* itemBehind = getFilterItem( num + 1 );
00591 
00592       if( itemBehind != NULL )
00593       {
00594         //swap numbers
00595         item->setNumber( num + 1 );
00596         itemBehind->setNumber( num );
00597 
00598         //inform application setup dialog about changes
00599         slotChanged();
00600 
00601       //do sorting
00602       listFilters->sortItems( 0, Qt::AscendingOrder );
00603 
00604       }
00605     }
00606   }
00607 }
00608 
00609 FilterSetupItem* ConfigFilter::getFilterItem( uint num )
00610 {
00611   FilterSetupItem* foundItem = NULL;
00612   bool found = false;
00613 
00614   //get Iterator
00615   QTreeWidgetItemIterator it( listFilters );
00616 
00617   //iterate over th elist to look for the item
00618   while( *it && !found )
00619   {
00620     //get current number
00621     uint curNumber = ( (FilterSetupItem*)*it )->getNumber();
00622 
00623     //have we found it?
00624     if( curNumber == num )
00625     {
00626       foundItem = (FilterSetupItem*)*it;
00627 
00628       found = true;
00629     }
00630 
00631     ++it;
00632   }
00633 
00634   return foundItem;
00635 }

00637 void ConfigFilter::slotFilterActiveToggled( bool filterOn )
00638 {
00639   gboxSenderLists->setEnabled( filterOn );
00640   gboxFilters->setEnabled( filterOn );
00641   gboxOthers->setEnabled( filterOn );
00642 }

00644 void ConfigFilter::slotOpenMailBoxWizard( )
00645 {
00646   QPointer<MailBoxWizard> wizard = new MailBoxWizard( this );
00647   wizard->setWindowTitle( i18nc( "@title:window", "Mailbox Select" ) );
00648   int res = wizard->exec();
00649 
00650   if( res == QDialog::Accepted )
00651     txtMailbox->setText( wizard->getPath() );
00652 
00653   delete wizard;
00654 
00655 }
